rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entry with wooden lattice work.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows, traditional thatched roof design.
Intimate dining area connected to the kitchen and living space.
Modern, well-equipped kitchen with traditional Kerala elements such as a wood-burning stove.
Spacious master bedroom overlooking the central courtyard.
Well-lit bedroom with traditional wooden floors and furniture.
Luxurious bathroom connected to the master bedroom, featuring both shower and bathtub.
Modern bathroom connected to a standard bedroom.

openings.location: Southeastern side of the entry hall

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony overlooking the garden.
Well-lit bedroom with traditional wooden floors and furniture.
Luxurious bathroom connected to the master bedroom, featuring both shower and bathtub.
Modern bathroom connected to a standard bedroom.

openings.location: Eastern wall of the living room
Southern wall of the master bedroom balcony
